data.text: @CoullTeacher @albertateachers What about before January???   How many paycheques of yours have been affected?
@john01893927 @albertateachers in Jan due to COVID spreading through my class, I did NOT work from home. Watch your assumptions... you have no idea.

@john01893927 @albertateachers For the record, teachers just want everyone to be safe and healthy in schools... and also, online learning is definitely far from a free ride. Each time I have shifted to online learning I have worked WAY more than ever in my career. Also, when my class shifted to online learning
@renner1474 @albertateachers What just cause I think most government employees are milking a lot of the covid “benefits” I’m a bot …. Well 🖕🏻

@albertateachers Many teachers are happy they can take their mask off to teach to show off their joy of learning. The option to mask when close to students and unmask to teach is going to be amazing. Those concerned can and will continue to wear N95s, the only mask that makes a difference.
@albertateachers This will cause many more cases and sick kids and teachers. This is NOT a mild disease in many, and is very transmissible. #LongCovid #COVIDisAirborne
@albertateachers This is the first troll on this thread.  I expect many more. You can check behavior patterns of suspect tweets with https://t.co/RxRBjyH5TN.

@albertateachers So if the teachers are all vaccinated and can wear masks if they wish what’s the issue ?   Or do they just wanna go back to online learning so they can “work” from home ?   Get the f back to normal work free ride is over
@albertateachers @HQuinnLocal37 Teachers and staff will continue to mask until it’s safe. Now is not the time.
